SEARCH
Package com.dreamwork.controller

Class RecruiterController

java.lang.Object
com.dreamwork.controller.RecruiterController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/recruiters") public class RecruiterController extends Object
Controller for handling recruiter-related operations. Provides endpoints for recruiters to manage their profile, job ads, and view candidate applications. Includes functionality for updating recruiter details, creating and deleting job ads, and viewing candidate CVs.

      Parameters:

    • viewCv

      @GetMapping("/job-ads/view-cv/candidate/{candidateId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> viewCv(@PathVariable Long candidateId)
      Provides the CV of a candidate for viewing.
      Parameters:
      candidateId - The ID of the candidate whose CV is being viewed.
      Returns:
      A response entity with the CV file as an PDF.
